sections.heading: of property; notice; procedure
sections.text: The same notice of sale shall be given as when lands are sold on execution by the sheriff, and the sale shall be conducted in like manner, except as to place of sale.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 817, p. 539;R.S.1913, ยง 8300;Laws 1917, c. 142, ยง 1, p. 328;C.S.1922, ยง 9253;C.S
